items.text: Render markup from data, also known as the state of the application.
Add interactive behavior to rendered markup.
Call `querySelector` method to find a descendant element in the tree structure..
Read server code that responds to `GET` and `POST` requests.
Read and write requests which apply the REST API pattern.
Write promise chains to handle success or failure of `fetch` requests.
Organize files for development and bundle for distribution.
Find errors while you write code instead of when you run code.
Format code consistently to not waste critique on personal preferences.
Keep sensitive information like API keys in server instead of client.
